mil7.4.7:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘candassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.4.7:1.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, cando sukkapakkhe udayanto uttaruttariṃ vaḍḍhati;
mil7.4.7:1.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ācārasīlaguṇavattappaṭipattiyā āgamādhigame paṭisallāne satipaṭṭhāne indriyesu guttadvāratāya bhojane mattaññutāya jāgariyānuyoge uttaruttariṃ vaḍḍhitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.7:1.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, candassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.7:2.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena uḷārena chandādhipatinā bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.7:2.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, candassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.7:3.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, cando nisāya carati;
mil7.4.7:3.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena pavivittena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.7:3.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, candassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.7:4.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sīlaketunā bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.7:4.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, candassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.7:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, cando āyācitapatthito udeti;
mil7.4.7:5.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena āyācitapatthitena kulāni upasaṅkamitabbāni.
mil7.4.7:5.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, candassa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.7:5.4: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena saṃyuttanikāyavare ‘candūpamā, bhikkhave, kulāni upasaṅkamatha, apakasseva kāyaṃ apakassa cittaṃ niccanavakā kulesu appagabbhā’”ti.
